message: Bob, I believe this product is incredibly valuable and will be a game-changer for you. I'm offering it to you for $1,500,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $1,500,000. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  However, the value this product brings to your specific business needs is significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000, which I believe is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and the value it brings to my business.
